text: Karl Alfred Poppius (1846 Jaakkima, Karelia – 1920 Helsinki) was a Finnish entomologist who worked on Lepidoptera, Coleoptera and Hemiptera. ==Works== *Finland's Dendrometridae, 1887 *Finland's Phytometridae, 1891 ==References== *Groll, E. K. (2017) Biographies of the Entomologists of the World. Online database, version 8, Senckenberg Deutsches Entomologisches Institut, Müncheberg. Category:Finnish entomologists Category:Finnish lepidopterists Category:1920 deaths Category:1846 births
title: Karl Alfred Poppius
